videos.description: Kihei Clark finds Tomas Woldetensae open in the corner for the wide-open 3-pointer.

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One Play (Virginia's Woldetensae splashes a corner trey) 2020/2/22

videos.headline: Virginia's Woldetensae splashes a corner trey

videos.description: Xavier Johnson pokes the ball out from behind and drops in a clutch lay-in against Virginia.
